title: Pakistan, China bilateral relations to continue for future generations: Farrukh
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 21 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib Friday said Pakistan and China had successfully completed 70 years of their diplomatic relations and expressed confidence that these all-weather bilateral ties would continue for the future generations.
“People as well as leadership from both the countries feel pride and cherish this relationship with full trust,” he said in a tweet on the 70th anniversary of Pak-China diplomatic relations.
Pakistan  and china  has successfully completed 70th years of their diplomatic relationship. People as well as leadership from both countries feels pride and cherish this relationship with full trust. Hope this trust will continue for generations to come. @zlj517
— Farrukh Habib (@FarrukhHabibISF) May 21, 2021
He hoped that this trust would continue for the generations to come.
